Another can be done at range, so even if you think you're at a safe distance, be ready to dodge if he adopts a stance and then dashes up for a glowing elbow strike attack.
img_below_text:
By far his most dangerous move will come when he adopts a martial arts stance, holding a raised fist behind his head while dropping the other arm.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the video game "Black Myth: Wukong," showing a character in a red outfit facing off against an enemy in a snowy landscape. The preceding text describes a ranged attack by the enemy, while the following text warns of a dangerous martial arts stance. The image likely illustrates the tense moment before an attack, emphasizing the need for the player to be prepared for the enemy's moves.
